00020 
00021 class WaveTrack;
00022 
00023 class EffectInvert:public EffectSimpleMono {
00024 
00025  public:
00026    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00027       return wxString(_("Invert"));
00028    }
00029    
00030    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00031       std::set<wxString> result;
00032       result.insert(wxT("http://lv2plug.in/ns/lv2core#UtilityPlugin"));
00033       return result;
00034    }
00035 
00036    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00037       return wxString(wxT("Invert"));
00038    }
00039 
00040    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00041       return wxString(_("Inverting"));
00042    }
00043    
00044  protected:
00045    virtual bool ProcessSimpleMono(float *buffer, sampleCount len);
00046 };
